entry.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 11B10
entry.content:
Jun 11, 19:45 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/06/2023 16:55 UTC
End Time : 11/06/2023 18:00 UTC
Root cause : Our technical teams resolved the issue.
All impacted servers are now operational.

Jun 11, 19:18 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jun 11, 17:38 UTC
Identified - This incident was caused by a problem with a module in the cooling system.
Our technical teams are working on it to restore service quickly.

Jun 11, 17:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/06/2023 16:55 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA1][Private/Public Network] - G115A15
entry.content:
Jun 9, 13:14 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 09/06/2023 12:36 UTC
End time : 09/06/2023 12:52 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Ongoing actions : It was due to a malfunction on the electrical distribution

Jun 9, 12:57 UTC
Update - Start time : 09/06/2023 12:36 UTC
End time : 09/06/2023 12:52 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Ongoing actions : It was due to a malfunction on the electrical distribution

Jun 9, 12:56 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 9, 12:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/06/2023 12:36UTC
Service impact : Private and Public Network are unreachable on this rack
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - R804L11 - R804L12
entry.content:
Jun 9, 11:41 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/06/2023 09:20 UTC
End Time : 09/06/2023 11:35 UTC
Root cause : Issue on a cooling module.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 9, 11:17 UTC
Update - All the servers in the R804L11 rack are operational again, and our technical teams are working on the remaining ones in rack R804L12.

Jun 9, 09:41 UTC
Identified - Start time : 09/06/2023 09:20 UTC
Service impact :Some servers in racks R804L11, R804L12 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Issue on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions :Our technical teams are working on this incident.
